conversations.content: When is the family reunion going to be, based on the emails? Give me the date and time in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'.

<function_thought>
To determine the date and time of the family reunion based on the emails, I first need to retrieve any unread emails that may contain the information about the reunion. This will allow me to search through the content to find a date and time. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_unread_emails()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

The sent emails include messages regarding a family reunion. However, they do not specify a date and time for the reunion directly. I need to search these emails using the keyword "family reunion" to find any details that might mention the specific date and time.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[search_emails(query="family reunion")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
